channel.title: Weapon max hit
channel.description: Is there a way to change the max hit of a weapon? or? i searched and found nothing. also is there a way to change how many of one thing you can buy at a time, like in rune shops right click and buy 100, 400 or anything like that?

item.title: Weapon max hit
item.dc:creator: @0wnt_pk3r79 0wnt pk3r79
item.description:
@0wnt_pk3r79 wrote:

yea thats what im sayin he said u couldnt?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon max hit
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

For buy ten:

client.java
ctrl + f

case 129:

in it find

} else if (interfaceID == 3900) {

then where it uses the method “buyItem”

buyItem(removeID, removeSlot, 10);

edit the 10 to whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon max hit
item.dc:creator: @Micro_Soft Micro Soft™
item.description:
@Micro_Soft wrote:

[quote=“fasinating, post:2, topic:5934”]Can’t change the buy 10 whatever, but admins can do ::cbrunes ::basic runes and just sell them 2 the players, in bulks of 999k =]
And for the max hit, just edit the bonuses of the weapon.[/quote]

Seriously, I’m not trying to be mean… Are you retarded? You can change Buy 10 Runes, to where you buy 50, or more…You’re right about the bonus part, but you should have said where. Open up Item.cfg, and search for the weapon. Then pick which bonus, or bonuses you want to change.

Read full topic
